programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura berbohong dengan Fariz yang bengkak di kepalanya akiat terhantuk pada sinki. Dalam waktu yang sama, Rohana mendakwa Ainnura sengaja menolaknya sehinggakan dia hampir terjatuh. Fateha menyokong kata-kata Rohana, menyebabkan Fariz keliru siapakah yang benar di antara isteri dan ibunya. Ainnura bangkit mempertahankan haknya. Selain daripada Ainnura, Fawwaz turut menjadi mangsa Rohana dan Fateha dengan pelbagai penghinaan sehingga akhirnya kerana tidak sanggup melihat Fawwaz dihina, Fazira mengakui yang Fawwaz adalah anaknya.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Fateha dan Rohana terkejut apabila mengetahui Fawwaz adalah anak Fazira hasil hubungan terlarang dengan Raja Azali iaitu kekasih Fateha. Pada mulanya mereka tidak percaya tetapi ketika mereka hendak mendapatkan penjelasan daripada Raja Azali, Raja Azali telah ditangkap polis atas beberapa tuduhan merogol. Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Rakan-rakan Oya sengana membiarkan Oya dan Mika bersendirian dengan harapan mereka berdua dapat berbaik semula. Namun niat mereka itu disalah anggap oleh Oya.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Icha dan Umai merasa sangat bersalah terhadap Oya dan cuba untuk memohon maaf. Semua pelajar risau dengan tugasan yang diberikan oleh pensyarah mereka.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Mika mahu Oya menolong membuat tugasannya jika tidak mahu rahsia Oya terbongkar. Pertemuan Oya dengan kawan lamanya, Jaja membuatkan Oya merasa bersemangat untuk belajar semula.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Semua rakan-rakan Oya masih risaukan Oya yang kelihatan terlalu rapat dengan Jaja, kerana Jaja sering berpewatakan seperti lelaki. Mereka mahu Mika memikat hati Oya.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Oya terkejut kerana mendapat bungkusan hadiah daripada pengirim yang tidak dikenali. Tanpa disangka, Oya semakin pandai menggunakan ilmu kejururawatan untuk menolong orang yang cedera.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Tok Wan, Ilah berhasrat untuk membatalkan perkahwinan Ainnura dengan Fariz. Bagaimanapun Ainnura bertegas untuk meneruskan rancangan mereka kerana itu juga yang dimahukan oleh Tok Wan demi meliah keluarga Ainnura dan keluarga Fariz berdamai. Rohana menyokong keputusan Ainnura dan ini menyebabkan Ilah kecil hati dengan Ainnura. Ilah akhirnya tidak hadir pada hari perkahwinan Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Sikap prihatin dan baik Rohana terhadap Ainnura akhirnya terbongkar apabila tujuan Rohana merestui hasrat Fariz untuk megahwini Ainnura hanyalah semata-mata untuk membalas dendam pada Ainnura. Rohana paksa Ainnura tinggal bersamanya dan jika Ainnura menujuk Fariz supaya keluar dari rumah tersebut, dia tidak halal susu yang diminum oleh Fariz serta menganggap Fariz anak derhaka. Sementara itu, dalam diam Ilah sebenarnya merindui Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rohana sengaja menyeksa fizikal dan mental Ainnura. Fazira melihat apa yang dilakukan oleh Rohana terhadap Ainnura lalu mendesak Ainnura dan Fariz keluar dari rumah tersebut. Bagaimanapun Ainnura enggan kerana tidak mahu Fariz dianggap sebagai anak derhaka. Gara-hara terlalu marah dengan Ainnura, Rohana telah menghentak kepala Ainnura ke dinding. Fariz perasan dengan bengkak di kepala Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura berbohong dengan Fariz yang bengkak di kepalanya akiat terhantuk pada sinki. Dalam waktu yang sama, Rohana mendakwa Ainnura sengaja menolaknya sehinggakan dia hampir terjatuh. Fateha menyokong kata-kata Rohana, menyebabkan Fariz keliru siapakah yang benar di antara isteri dan ibunya. Ainnura bangkit mempertahankan haknya. Selain daripada Ainnura, Fawwaz turut menjadi mangsa Rohana dan Fateha dengan pelbagai penghinaan sehingga akhirnya kerana tidak sanggup melihat Fawwaz dihina, Fazira mengakui yang Fawwaz adalah anaknya.

programme.desc: Fateha dan Rohana terkejut apabila mengetahui Fawwaz adalah anak Fazira hasil hubungan terlarang dengan Raja Azali iaitu kekasih Fateha. Pada mulanya mereka tidak percaya tetapi ketika mereka hendak mendapatkan penjelasan daripada Raja Azali, Raja Azali telah ditangkap polis atas beberapa tuduhan merogol. Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1

programme.desc: Hannah and her friend Alia have gone to an abandoned construction site to find material for her YouTube channel, but she unknowingly records a murder.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever mans fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyones surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the wedding of the year.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Perangkap Perkahwinan
programme.desc: Three best friends promised to get married, at the same time when they turn 26 years old. Their perceptions of marriage life begin to change and conflict ensues.

programme.title: Cik Puan Sinderella
programme.desc: This is a lighthearted family drama about a teenage girl who is closely guarded by her mother.

programme.title: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan Anak Kerak demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Buta
programme.desc: Telefilem komedi romantik tentang perkenalan singkat di antara Zulin, seorang gadis yang tidak pernah bercinta, dengan Izlan, seorang duda dalam satu blind date yang diaturkan oleh Nadya Ramanshah.

programme.title: Matahari
programme.desc: Fauzi seorang guru yang telah dihantar untuk berkhidmat di Sabah. Di sana dia telah berkenalan dengan seorang novelis yang sedang mengalami masalah writers block iaitu Yazid.

programme.title: Meniti Cinta Di Starimost
programme.desc: Iman dipaksa berkahwin dengan Qaseh, anak kepada orang gajinya untuk mewarisi harta bapanya. Percutian mereka di Bosnia membuahkan bibit-bibit cinta. Lakonan Iqram Dinzly, Zarina Zainoordin dan Yana Shamsudin.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani And Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.

programme.title: Kampung Kuala Lambat
programme.desc: Kampung Kuala Lambat bagai mengalami sumpahan apabila lelaki yang berkahwin muda akan mati di hari pernikahan mereka namun kejadian ganjil ini tidak berlaku kepada lelaki yang berusia 60 tahun ke atas.

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Dua
programme.desc: Kisah Farhan yang kehilangan kembarnya Fahrin dalam satu kemalangan tragis. Dia kemudiannya mengambil-alih kehidupan Fahrin namun terperangkap dalam sebuah cinta tiga segi pula. Lakonan Eusoff Hashim dan Sharifah Sakinah.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: Cupid
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang ejen yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat penghancur jodoh yang ditugaskan untuk memikat seorang wanita supaya dapat melupakan suaminya yang telah diisytiharkan meninggal dunia. Namun dia jatuh cinta pada wanita tersebut

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: Tormented by his criminal past, Clean attempts a quiet life caring for his community and as a mentor to his young neighbor Dianda. When local gang violence puts his neighbors life in danger, Clean finds himself returning to his violent past.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: The Legion

programme.title: Crom

programme.title: ARKHAM
programme.desc: Disguised as simple slaves, Tyrannus and Octavian look for allies in the countryside but they are captured at General Magoniuss farm and taken to Arkham, where men are forced to train as gladiators. As an ex-gladiator himself Tyrannus is able to acquit himself well and to overcome Magonius, inspiring the other imprisoned men to revolt and escape. He and Octavian see a group of horsemen coming towards them but are relieved to find that they are led by Mark Antony.

programme.title: FINALS: KINGS VS AQUAS
programme.desc: The Taiwan Professional Basketball League (TPBL) is Taiwans premier professional basketball league, bringing elite players, passionate fans, and world-class entertainment to create an electrifying basketball experience. With a commitment to excellence, innovation, and fan engagement, TPBL is shaping the future of professional basketball in Asia and inspiring the next generation of athletes.

programme.title: THE BLACK KNIGHT RETURNS
programme.desc: As an evil force rises to threaten the city, a young man returns home to take over The Black Knight legacy.

programme.title: DAY 3
programme.desc: Shaken by Claudias revelation, J.T. attempts to run a secret ballistics test on the gun she carries in her purse but succeeds only in tearing up his basement workshop. Meanwhile, the results of the other tests are coming in. Tim Sanders says the crime scene photos and clippings are authentic, even if they are technically impossible. Brad reports the briefcase is, without a doubt, from the future, made of a super-strong, ultra-light material that will make them both rich beyond their dreams if only J.T. will let him keep it. Carl has emerged from a frantic all-nighter with an unsettling conclusion. Not only does physics indicate that J.T. will die on Friday, but Carl has predicted the universe will be irrevocably damaged if he doesnt.

programme.title: Wild Castles
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey.

programme.title: Wild Castles
programme.desc: Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of historys greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Castles
programme.desc: Discover the worlds largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also for the regions wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Castles
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spains Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the regions wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Castles
programme.desc: Learn how one of the worlds most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Zambias Luangwa Valley is home to Africas biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Africa is a continent filled with unique and extraordinary creatures whose lives are shaped by millions of years of evolution. Africa is also the birthplace of humankind.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Chilema is an Elephant with half a trunk; losing the tip to a poachers snare. It was intended to catch antelope for bushmeat.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Trees are Africas oldest residents, and each has its own strategy for surviving the dry season. The sausage tree and the fig tree ride-out seasonal extremes, to provide food and shelter.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Embark on a dangerous tagging mission in South Australia that will show what sharks eat and why they gather in feeding hot spots.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Track a pregnant shark along the Great Barrier Reef and see if she leads a team of scientists to her hidden pupping ground. Then search for signs of mating along the southern coast.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Ponder shark community hierarchies as the northern team studies how young blacktips learn social and survival skills. Then rush to Rainbow Beach with the southern team.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of Australias shark highways. Find out if Greenly Island in the south is a truck stop for migrating great whites, then search for proof of a genetic connection between the sharks.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Follow the southern team as they test new migration tech and tools that could reduce shark attacks in a popular snorkelling spot. Then catch and tag bull sharks with the northern team.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs lives.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Head into surgery with Mara the koala, who needs a life-saving tooth operation, then assess an injured sugar glider with vet Tim.

programme.title: Stormborn
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved.

programme.title: Wild Tales From the Farm
programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Dash across southeast Queensland as breeding and snake-catching season ramp up. Watch Adele and Mick go up against an eastern brown, the second deadliest snake in the world, while Stu and Liv tangle with a carpet python.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Launch into springs snake surge with Liv and Stu, who intercept two male brown snakes duelling for mating rights at a construction site. Stand back as Dan and Jess rescue chickens from a python, and Mick and Adele hunt for a rogue green tree snake.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Beep, beep! Its time for a vehicle adventure. Hop aboard the bus with JJ and sing about its wheels, wipers, and horn. The journey continues as he discovers cars of every color and other amazing machines that vroom and zoom. Its a high-energy story celebrating all the things that go.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn with JJ! Embark on a musical journey that starts with the ABC Song, making it fun to learn every letter. Once youve mastered the alphabet, the adventure continues with a trip back in time to count from one to ten with a group of silly dinosaurs. Its a fun-filled lesson that makes learning feel like a game.

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Join Cody for a great day out! He starts by riding the bus with his family, then goes on a wild safari to find dinosaurs. The adventure continues at Dinoland where he celebrates his birthday with a rollercoaster ride. At school, he forms a rock band with his friends and his dino dreams come true with a special Dino Day celebration. The day ends with a trip to the beach and the excitement of seeing the recycling truck.

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Singing is always fun with Cody and his friends! He uses his imagination to play with a simple cardboard box and solves a mystery of ten missing buses. When Cody gets upset, he learns to handle his emotions in a healthy way. He has a playdate with Nina where they learn the value of sharing, helps his dad cook delicious vegetables and discovers that even when plans dont work out, friends can make any day a special day.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Being a good friend is the best! Join JJ as he learns some very important lessons. When his friends want to play, he discovers the joy of sharing. Through a day of play, he learns that saying please and thank you and being kind makes every game more fun for everyone.

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Its singing time with Cody! Join him as he helps his dad bake and deliver muffins. When his friends get boo-boos, he makes them feel better. He takes a bath with his favorite dinosaur toy, goes on a spy adventure with JJ, learns about new African instruments from his dad and welcomes his baby sister, Kendi, to their home sweet home with a special song.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Are you ready to dance? A magical mirror creates colorful chaos and fluffy cloud sheep come down to play! Take a ride on a bus driven by a fun-loving monkey and try to keep a sneaky wolf away from your alphabet cupcakes. Go on a pirate adventure on the high seas, play peekaboo with safari animals and make funny faces on your breakfast pancakes.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for giggles and fun! When JJs toy is broken, Boba cheers him up by pretending to be a tickly caterpillar. The friends find a disco mat and have a groovy dance-off. When JJ gets frustrated while skiing, Mochi is there to encourage him. A pirate swipes the bath toys and a buzzing fly interrupts breakfast. Plus, Wally plays firefighter and ends up being the one who needs rescuing!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day for an animal adventure! Join JJ as he visits a farm to sing Old MacDonald with all the animals. The fun continues as he learns about the sounds animals make and dances along with them. This musical story is a delightful journey into the wonderful world of our furry and feathered friends.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn and sing! In this educational adventure, JJ discovers the magic of numbers, the beauty of colors, and the fun of shapes. Each new lesson is a new song, making the learning process an exciting and joyful experience. Its a musical story that proves how fun it is to learn new things.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Have some fun and dance with JJ and his friends! Put on your firefighter hat and dance, then celebrate the sights and sounds of spring. Sing about yummy vegetables, colorful jello and how much you love your friends. Go on a big adventure with Jack the Mouse as he climbs a giant beanstalk and dance with Ramona the seal from the circus.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ for a day of nursery rhyme adventures with his animal friends. First, help Mary find her little lamb, then sing about a black sheep with lots of wool. The fun ends with a clapping game all about a farm dog named BINGO. Its a charming story told through our favorite animal songs.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ and his friends! Work together to build a giant pillow fort and then go on a fun family vacation in a camper van. Do amazing science experiments with TomTom and YoYo and learn how to make the perfect peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Take a trip to the train park with your grandparents and learn how to take good care of Bingo the dog.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Get ready to sing and dance with JJ! See all the amazing things that live down by the bay, then march along with the ants before the rain starts. Dance with five speckled frogs on a log, snap your claws with a dinosaur and sing about your favorite pets. Learn a song in Spanish about little chicks, then celebrate CoComelon with a special song and dance.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Lets learn about teeth and food! Join JJ to discover his favorite pizza toppings and then take a trip to a farm to count apples. After all that yummy food, learn how to take care of your teeth by brushing them well. When JJ gets nervous about a dentist visit, his siblings show him it can be fun. Plus, learn how to make a healthy and delicious frozen fruit treat!

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Grab your instrument and march along to John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt! Get into the holiday spirit with Up on the Housetop and Deck the Halls. Make a splash down by the bay and get active with fun exercise dance moves. Crawl like the Itsy Bitsy Spider, swim with the mermaids and do the Chuchuwa dance. Its a musical marching adventure!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ for a fantastic sing-along! Learn how to make all kinds of pasta with Grandma. Visit the new petting zoo at the farm and meet all the adorable baby animals. After a fun day, learn why its important to clean up. Give Bingo a bath to get him sparkly clean and then have a surprise picnic for Mom and Dad. Its a day full of fantastic fun and songs!

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Welcome to a delightful dance party! Stomp your feet like a dinosaur at Dino Land then do the robot dance on a space-themed stage. Cool off with a summer sprinkler dance and learn how to say please and thank you in ASL. Play a game of freeze dance, use your imagination to pretend youre on an adventure and end the day with a fun pajama dance party.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for some sing-along fun! A tiny spider is determined to get a drink from a lemonade stand. JJ goes on a big adventure when he buys some magic beans that grow into a giant beanstalk. The friends play a game of hide-and-seek and JJ spends the day with his bestie, Boba the bear. After a fun day, its time to have a clean-up dance party!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to sing along with JJ through a day of adventures! Join the exciting doggy hunt to find Bingo on his birthday. Use your imagination to play the floor is lava with the family. Learn how to take care of pets and see all the kids favorite toys during Play and Tell at school. Get a surprise visit from a real fire engine and join a Thanksgiving feast that celebrates family and friends.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its JJs Animal Time and theres so much to do! Join Wally as he directs a play version of Hey Diddle Diddle. Go on a treasure hunt to find the keys to unlock a mysterious chest. Help Little Red Riding JJ avoid Wally the Wolfs silly traps. Then, blast off in a rocketship to play tag with the stars. Its a day of fun, friendship and adventure with all of JJs animal pals!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: On your marks, get set, go! Its a day of fun and friendly competition. Join JJ and his friends as they head outside for a sports day. Theyll splash in the pool, kick a soccer ball on the field, and learn that the most important part of any game is having fun and trying your best.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Get ready to dance to all your favorite songs! Join the silly animal dance and then put on your tutu for the ballerina dance. See classic nursery rhymes come to life as a cow jumps over the moon and all the sea creatures help Humpty Dumpty. Dance with the animals in the jungle and see all the different vehicles on the street. End the day with a fun pajama dance party to get all the wiggles out before bed.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to a nursery rhyme dance party! Rock out to a remix of Rockabye Baby with a band of monkeys and dance faster and faster as London Bridge falls down. Fly into outer space to dance among the stars, then dive deep under the sea to swim like a mermaid. Dance about the weather, sing about popping bubbles and play a fun game of freeze dance.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to a dance and play party! Go on a make-believe adventure to outer space or the bottom of the sea. Find your Happy Place, and then do the Coco Dance and the Looby Loo. Sing about friendship, play a game of Red Light, Green Light, and have a Copy Me style dance-off on the playground. Its party time!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: The school bell is ringing for the very first time for JJ! Join him on the exciting journey of his first day of school. Hell learn how to ride the bus, meet his friendly teacher, and make a whole new group of friends. This story shows that school is a wonderful place for learning, playing, and making new memories.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Dive in for a Baby Shark dance party! Jump, clap and chomp with colorful sharks, then hop along with the Easter bunnies. Learn what sound a cow makes, bounce with kangaroos and count five little duckies. Sing about your bestie, see what Cece finds in the sea and finish the party with a graceful princess dance.

programme.title: CoComelon Classroom
programme.desc: Join Ms. Appleberry and JJ as they meet the classroom goldfish, Flip, Flop and learn about shapes. Help an alligator learn to brush her teeth, quack and count like ducks then explore the letter G. Discover opposites like big and small with help from the Melon Learning Box and sing along to fun songs.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Press play on a day of musical fun! Follow JJ and his friends as they go on adventures, with a special song for every moment. They sing about their families, their animal friends, and the fun of playing together. This story is a journey through the wonderful, song-filled world of CoComelon.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to an animal dance party! Join the Animal Song and dance with creatures from the forest, farm and jungle. See the race between the Tortoise and the Hare, then hop along with the little bunnies. Visit the farm to sing with Old MacDonalds animals, the black sheep and all the friends in the dell. Find the little duckies who are hiding and play with a hip hippo down by the lake.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Get ready for an Animal Time Sing Along! JJ and his friends work together to get a boat to an island full of apples and bananas. A bunny gets left behind by the bus, but his friends help him get on. A sneaky wolf tries to steal a blueberry pie and Mimi builds a rocket to see if the moon is really made of cheese. Plus, JJ puts on a show for all his animal friends and learns how to be a pirate.

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for Ninas song and dance! The friends dance with all the baby animals at the petting zoo. They go on a scavenger hunt to find flowers that match the colors of the rainbow. They dream of flying high in the sky like their pilot dad. Nina chases a surprise egg through the grocery store and tries to catch bubbles without popping them. Plus, she celebrates her birthday with a piata and learns some healthy habits.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: If youre happy, sing along with JJ and friends! Enjoy story time with Little Bunny Foo Foo and sing about all the animals on Grandpas farm. Play with five little animals on a sleepy Saturday morning. Learn how to be brave on the playground, use your imagination with a pretend play song and discover all the cool shapes in your lunchbox. Its a day of happy songs and playful learning!

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: JJs best animal pals are back and sillier than ever! Sing along with JJ and his friends on their wild and hilarious adventures featuring fairy tales, fables, nursery rhymes, and so much more.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: JJ is having a dance party and youre invited! Dance and countdown with five little dinosaurs, then see how fast you can sing Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes. Visit a pumpkin patch, dance among the stars and help solve the mystery of Who Took the Cookie. Sing about the Muffin Man, learn your vowels with Apples and Bananas, and express your joy in Italian!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: In JJs world, theres a song for everything! Follow him on a day of musical discovery where every activity has its own special tune. Whether hes playing with his puppy, learning new things at school, or getting ready for bed, this story shows how music can make every part of the day more fun.

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Cody has amazing friends and they have great adventures together! He and JJ imagine theyre in an extreme motor trike race. He and Cece go on a nature walk and help a lost duckling find its home. During recess, Cody plays with all the other Melon Patch kids. Even when hes alone, Cody has fun playing with his favorite blankie and making leaf crowns in the autumn leaves.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: This story is a celebration of family! Follow JJ through a day spent with the people he loves most. He sings a special song for his mommy and another for his daddy, showing how much he appreciates them. Its a heartwarming tale about the joy and love that comes from being with your family.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Whats on the menu today? Fun! Join JJ as he learns why its great to eat vegetables with the Yes Yes Vegetables song. Then, get your hands ready for a fun time in the kitchen as he sings and claps along to Pat-a-Cake. Its a delicious and musical tale about our favorite foods.

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for a Pet Store Woof! Nina and her dad take a trip to the pet store, where her dog, Patas, uses his woofs to tell them everything he needs. Nina sings the Finger Family song as she helps her family members find their missing things. She challenges her friends to a soccer game and has a special secret on Nochebuena. Plus, she goes on an adventure with her stuffed bunny and builds a new paper doll friend with her Abuelita.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ as he learns that chores and routines can be fun! When its time to tidy up his toys, the Clean Up Song makes it a breeze. When its time to get ready, the This is the Way song helps him get dressed all by himself. This story shows how a good song can make any task a fun activity.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready for a day of fun and games with JJ! The excitement begins with a game of Peek-A-Boo, full of giggles and surprises. Then, become a detective and help solve the mystery of who took the cookies from the cookie jar!

Jeff has to overcome his fear of mud to get his favorite feather duster back. Bubbles wants to take a picture with a big purple star and builds a rocket to get to it. Pogo tries to surprise his friends with ice cream, but it keeps melting.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some pumpkin munch mayhem! Newt has grown a giant pumpkin for Halloween, but a hungry Wrigglepillar keeps trying to eat it. In a football game, Bubbles cheats to help her team win. Jeff is excited for a dancing game, but Fuse wont listen to the instructions and ruins the fun.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its always cool to be cool on Lellobee City Farm! A penguin visits and teaches everyone how to stay cool on a hot day. A new rooster is having trouble remembering how to crow, but Ella helps him figure it out. The ducklings have their first flying lesson and the friends clean out the pond to give the animals a nice new home. Plus, celebrate the Moon Festival with a special party.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Theres always a reason to sing with Little Angel! Baby Johns imagination runs wild as he plays pretend, becoming a doctor and a chef all in one day. Later, he learns to be brave and overcome his fear of the dark with a happy song. The adventure continues with a fun-filled family day at the swimming pool, proving that every activity is better with a little music.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The sun is shining, and its a perfect day for the playground! Join Baby John as he explores the swings, the slide, and the sandbox. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about how to take turns with his friends and why sharing his toys makes every game more fun for everyone. Its a story about the joy of playing together.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The world is so much fun to explore! Join Blippi on his adventures as he discovers how rainbows get their colors and what its like on the moon while learning about gravity. Hell dive deep into the ocean with a jellyfish, find out how honey is made from a busy bee, see how snowflakes are formed and get a tour of a real chocolate factory. Its an exciting journey full of amazing discoveries!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready for some thrilling adventures with Blippi Wonders! This journey is packed with excitement and learning. Discover how a firetruck and a police car work, learn about the sticky science of glue, and see the amazing power of magnets. Its a fun-filled exploration of the amazing things that make our world work.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Prepare for pandemonium! Arpo and Daniels attempt at gardening takes a dangerous turn when their plant grows into a monstrous creature that tries to eat everyone. As if thats not enough, the new smart house system goes haywire, and the furniture starts a rebellion. Its up to Arpo to fix the pandemonium in this action-packed adventure.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Join ARPO for a day of non-stop chaos! When a simple handprint painting session with Daniel turns into a colorful mess, thats just the beginning. A pesky drone interrupts their peaceful afternoon, leading to an all-out battle for the backyard. See how ARPO handles one unexpected event after another in this wild and wacky tale.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Beep, beep! Its time for a vehicle adventure. Hop aboard the bus with JJ and sing about its wheels, wipers, and horn. The journey continues as he discovers cars of every color and other amazing machines that vroom and zoom. Its a high-energy story celebrating all the things that go.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: The skies over Petport are full of trouble! A giant UFO with a massive claw is stealing things from the city, creating panic. As Mila and Morphle fly up to stop it, they find themselves in even more trouble when the mischievous Orphle appears on a magical cloud, adding to the aerial mayhem. Its a high-flying adventure as they try to dodge two threats and save the citys stolen property.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Theres trouble in the city, and Officer Morphle is on patrol! His day starts when he has to stop a giant baby from causing chaos. The capers continue as he must then chase down a giant, runaway globe thats rolling through the streets. From stopping pesky bandits to solving mysteries, its a day full of action and adventure for the bravest cop car in town.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Get ready for a foodomatic adventure! With the Intergalactic Cook-Off Competition just a day away, the friends head to the Food Planet to make the perfect dish, but Emas fussy eating habits land them in hot water. Afterwards, Rob agrees to teach the gang martial arts and they travel to the Dojo Planet where Orbit learns to believe in himself.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The friends get egged on when they visit the Egg Planet to help a frazzled bunny catch and sort missing eggs. Later, when they realize everyone except Ema has a photo with one of the galaxys biggest objects, they head to the Cheese Planet to snap a picture of her with the biggest cheese.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for a nursery rhyme fun time! The friends pretend to row their boats in laundry baskets. They do a fun Hop Little Bunnies dance and play Ring-A-Ring O Roses in the garden. They build a bridge with blocks and Mr. Giraffe takes them all for a ride on the bus. Plus, they help two little birds and have a parade with homemade instruments.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Its time to learn about numbers, sounds and colors! The friends fly colorful fish kites at the park and bake some yummy cookies. They play with five little speckled frogs and five little green monster bottles. They learn about all the sounds that different vehicles make, how to say hello with a wave and what sounds different instruments make.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster and Bandit become the giant ice cream thieves when they sneak into a carwash that has been turned into an ice cream machine! The adventures continue as Buster gets locked in jail and has to be rescued and the friends form a band at the construction site. They also have to work up the courage to ride the new super-speedyway and help a lost cowboy hat find its way home.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Spend a day in the life of Buster! He plays a prank at the carwash and when his friend Scout gets a boo boo, he becomes Dr. Buster. He plays pirates in the soft play area with his mommy and friend Ash. Its sports day at school and Buster learns its not all about winning. He also deals with a wobbly tooth, plays cops and robbers and rescues a runaway train.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Even the best mechanic needs help sometimes! In this story, Gecko faces a problem thats too big for him to handle alone. But luckily, he has a garage full of fantastic friends. They all come together, combining their different strengths and skills to help Gecko save the day. Its a powerful tale of community and friendship.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! Their playtime takes a messy turn when Baby Trucks curiosity gets the better of him, and he ends up stuck deep in the mud. It looks like hes in real trouble, but his friends wont leave him behind. This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. Find a safe and quiet place for a hedgehog to hibernate for the winter. Plus, sing a song about Pablo the Pig and Carlos the Calf and get ready for a campfire sing-along.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its no fun being a spoilsport! Fuse finds a spider in his gym and is too scared to get it out. Jeff and Bubbles are having trouble playing with their building blocks together. Bubbles spoils Pogos magic show by exposing all his secrets and Lulu struggles to make a music video when her star Oddbird keeps marching away.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Who will be the winner? Newt really wants to win a gold star at the gym, but she keeps losing. Lulu is so excited for the funfair that she keeps jumping the line and upsetting her friends. Bubbles accidentally scrapes the paint on Jeffs ceiling and tries to fix it herself. At bedtime, Pogo wants to play, but everyone else is ready to sleep.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ on a magical carousel ride where his imagination turns him into a brave knight! When hes feeling scared, Dad helps him blast off in a pretend rocketship. Build an amazing maze for Jellybean the hamster, put on sunscreen at the beach and play a fun game of Peek-a-Boo. Then, become a detective and help solve the mystery of who took the cookies from the cookie jar!

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with the animals! Go on a submarine ride and learn about colors with a family of sharks. JJ hosts a talent show where all his friends can show off their special skills. The friends learn that they are all special in their own way and Humpty Dumpty has a great fall. Play a game of Duck, Duck, Goose, and help Boba find some food when his tummy is rumbling.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Get ready to dance to all your favorite songs! Join the silly animal dance and then put on your tutu for the ballerina dance. See classic nursery rhymes come to life as a cow jumps over the moon and all the sea creatures help Humpty Dumpty. Dance with the animals in the jungle and see all the different vehicles on the street. End the day with a fun pajama dance party to get all the wiggles out before bed.

When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to wind down with JJ. Follow his soothing bedtime routine, from taking a warm bath to brushing his teeth. As he looks out his window at the night sky, he sings Twinkle Twinkle Little Star before snuggling into bed for a sweet lullaby. Its a peaceful and relaxing journey into dreamland.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: As the day comes to a close, its time for Baby John to get ready for bed. This peaceful story follows his calming bedtime routine, from taking a warm bath and putting on his pajamas to listening to a sweet lullaby from his parents. Its a gentle journey that shows how a calm routine can lead to a wonderful nights sleep.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for bedtime with Mia. She says goodnight to all her toys and does some calming animal yoga. Daddy shows her how to brush her teeth with a fun dance. Twinkle helps make bath time a fun party. When her little brother cant sleep, Mia sings him a sweet lullaby. Plus, the moon and the stars fly over the town and say goodnight to everyone.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn and sing! In this educational adventure, JJ discovers the magic of numbers, the beauty of colors, and the fun of shapes. Each new lesson is a new song, making the learning process an exciting and joyful experience. Its a musical story that proves how fun it is to learn new things.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Are you ready to dance? A magical mirror creates colorful chaos and fluffy cloud sheep come down to play! Take a ride on a bus driven by a fun-loving monkey and try to keep a sneaky wolf away from your alphabet cupcakes. Go on a pirate adventure on the high seas, play peekaboo with safari animals and make funny faces on your breakfast pancakes.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its party time with Pogo! Hes invited to Jeffs party, but they cant agree on what kind of party it should be. Bubbles invents a new bouncy blob that gets out of control. When Lulu loses her favorite bunny, Bubbles becomes her superhero and helps her find it. Plus, Fuse learns that eating his greens will give him more energy.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some cupcake chaos! Lulu wants to bake a cupcake by herself, but when she doesnt follow the recipe, it turns into a giant, out-of-control blob! She also finds a colorful egg that hatches into a cute chick, but she has to let it go back to its mommy. The friends paint a big picture together, but Newt wants it all for herself.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Join Gecko and the team for a fun day out! They go camping and when it rains, they build a water wheel to generate green energy. At the beach, they play hide-and-seek and Eric and Dylan have a sandcastle building competition. The team helps Weasel when he gets sick, has a balloon race for Miles birthday and helps Trevor fix his farm on Earth Day.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Its time to be thankful! The team bakes a surprise apple pie for Grandma, but they have to hide it when she arrives early. At the construction site, a hockey puck sends a tire rolling away and Gecko has to get creative to catch it. They rescue a boat with a tow rope and when Geckos football team is losing, he comes up with a new strategy to score a touchdown.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep04 Roz, Datin Seri dan Ejen Mah kembali beraksi untuk menolong Roz menyelamatkan cucunya, Rin. Mereka dapat mengesan lokasi sebenar Rin dan menyelamatkannya sebelum Daniel dan polis tiba. Rin kini tahu identiti sebenar Opah Roz.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep05 Kegembiraan Roz dapat menyelamatkan Rin terbantut apabila penculik Rin telah melepaskan diri daripada tahanan polis. Roz juga mengaitkan kes penculikan Rin dengan kes Dr Kaos Jr yang terlepas dari penjara dengan rancangan jahat yang lebih besar.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep06 Roz dan Rin diserang. Dia menjejak para penyerangnya ke pangkalan rahsia mereka. Ejen Mah dihantar untuk menyiasat tetapi dia ditangkap. Roz, Datin Seri dan Rin bekerjasama membebaskan Ejen Mah dan Roz dapat mengalahkan Nora, ketua penculik. Tetapi Dr Kaos Jr telah maju selangkah dan bereksperimen dengan senjata barunya.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep07 Daniel marah kerana pembanteras jenayah melalkukan kerja polis dengan menangkap penjenayah-penjenayah. Tanpa dia ketahui itu adalah kerja ibunya sendiri. Sementara itu, Roz ditangkap oleh Dr Kaos Jr. Datin Seri menyelamatkan Roz dan mereka dapat maklumat nama ketua penjahat yang merancang semua kejahatan ini.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep08 Daniel menyesaki ibunya menyembunyikan sesuatu. Roz pula menyelinap masuk pengkalan operasi Gagak Putih dan telah diserang. Roz berdepan dengan kesilapan masa silamnya sebagai seorang ibu, isteri dan ejen perisik, yang kini kembali untuk memusnahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the heart of London, Inspector Callum Isitt teams up with the police to track down four dogs, including two St Bernard types that have allegedly been beaten by their owners. One trail leads Callum to bustling Parliament Square, where its believed the St Bernard types are being used to get passers-by to part with their cash. Will he manage to find the dogs that he is looking for?

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt travels to the moors above Whitby on the Yorkshire Coast to treat Bobo, an eight-year-old Capuchin. Meanwhile Samantha the scarlet macaw rules the roost and is displaying complete disobedience.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Dogs are mans most loyal friends. Their well-behaved and cute appearance is very soothing to our hearts. Thats why many people choose dogs to company with their family! There are many choices for companion dogs, but todays cute pet have well-developed muscles and a fierce look on their faces. But in fact, they love to act cute, making the contrast between their personality and appearance is extremely cute!nTodays Cute Pet Coming is going to subvert everyones impression on them! Follow us and get to know bulldogs with a fierce face and gentle heart!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve got stupid vs intelligent dogs, talented dogs, sporty dogs, pug life, dogs getting stuck, sleepy dogs, and dogs acting like humans.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet to bring you the most hilarious clips of Budgies (and other birds) on the planet, not so much -whos a clever boy- as -whos a funny boy-! Flying fails, performing Parrots and the real life angry birds -V weve assembled the very best the web has to offer, guaranteed to make you laugh out loud.

programme.title: Scruffts

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? Melon seeds are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss Cute Pet Guide!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Early morning - and Dr. Matt is on a routine visit to Flamingoland, near Malton, in North Yorkshire. As a specialist in exotic animals, he oversees the care of all the parks unusual inhabitants. Today, Matts in for some donkey work. Hes down on the childrens farm for a spot of dentistry on a young donkey that proves to be a bit of a handful.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In The Wirral, Inspector Anthony Joynes is called out to a shocking case where nine year old German Shepherd Reo has been left with an awful skin condition. Despite scratching so much that her face is covered in open sores she is still able to muster a wag of the tail, but will she have the strength to overcome her painful condition?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The Japanese animated film My Neighbor Totoro, which is popular all over the world is the childhood memory of many. Totoros classic furry body, round eyes and cute expression are very endearing. In South America, there is a kind of chinchilla that looks very similar to Totoro in the film. I heard that Taiwan now allows legal imports of these animals for breeding! Today, lets follow the Totoro zoo owner Molly and fall in love with the soft and cute charm of this animation star!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: A lone cow has gone wild and escaped into a neighbouring field.Dr. Matt has been called in to lend a hand. The heifer went wild two months ago and various tactics are employed to get Matt close enough to get a good shot with his dart gun. But the wary cow wins the first round and escapes. Matt decides to return another day.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Cathy Hyde is on a warrant to access a property in Leigh, suspected of being involved in puppy trafficking. Cathy discovers two Jack Russell types and two Yorkshire Terriers. Tragically, they were too late one for one dog that had passed away and another has badly fractured leg. Will Cathy be able to provide the escape that these dogs desperately need?

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from Madagascar is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie The Secret Life of Pets are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from The Avengers!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: A lone cow has gone wild and escaped into a neighbouring field.Dr. Matt has been called in to lend a hand. The heifer went wild two months ago and various tactics are employed to get Matt close enough to get a good shot with his dart gun. But the wary cow wins the first round and escapes. Matt decides to return another day.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Cathy Hyde is on a warrant to access a property in Leigh, suspected of being involved in puppy trafficking. Cathy discovers two Jack Russell types and two Yorkshire Terriers. Tragically, they were too late one for one dog that had passed away and another has badly fractured leg. Will Cathy be able to provide the escape that these dogs desperately need?

programme.title: A Thanksgiving Harvest
programme.desc: Time to dig in to the one holiday of the year that is all about the food! Think outside the pumpkin pie crust for these four unique offerings. Mias got you covered with the bread, two show-stopping desserts, and a creative way to use your leftovers!

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp And lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Dont you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn And Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo And corn nut crusted corn, and bangin banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: Pizzapalooza
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is throwin down a pizza spread like never before with his Chicago-style tavern pie with sausage And onion, a grilled pizza pocket with pepperoni And cheese, chicken wings a la pizzaiola, and a zesty grilled caesar salad to finish it off.

programme.title: Scrumptious Summer Sandwiches
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: Top of the Line Steaks
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is back to level up his steak game by grilling up a NY strip steak with roasted onions And poblanos, short ribs with chili paste and horseradish, and a grilled chateaubriand with charred broccolini. Steak your claim on these dishes!

programme.title: Family-Friendly BBQ
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde creates a tasty menu that kids And parents alike will love! Apple pancakes with coconut brown butter syrup, grilled cheese And tomato soup, cheesy chicken parm, and a sticky smores dessert rounds out the full day of deliciousness.

programme.title: Grilled Chicken 3 Ways
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde amps up your chicken dishes by making smoky chicken wings, a whole roasted turmeric ginger chicken with tamarind sauce, and chicken patties grilled in banana leaves with chili lime noodles. A frosty lime rickey finishes it all off!

programme.title: The Perfection of Pork
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings the heat when it comes to making perfect pork dishes including a root beer glazed pork banh mi, chorizo fried rice, Filipino sausage stuffed long hot peppers, and round it all out with a spicy grilled pineapple sundae.

programme.title: Tempting Tasty Tacos
programme.desc: Its always taco night at Chef Dales house! He turns up the heat with grilled salmon tacos with salsa verde And cauliflower escabeche, duck al pastor tacos with habanero pineapple salsa, And a smokey mushroom queso taco with truffle mole negro.

programme.title: Breakfast for Dinner
programme.desc: Its dinnertime and breakfast is on the menu this week. These affordable breakfast specials are hearty enough for dinner, and so delicious they may even taste better after dark. Grab a fork and dig in for the most important meal of the day!

programme.title: Thanksgiving Leftovers
programme.desc: Give Thanksgiving leftovers a whole new meaning this year. Frankie knows just the trick for transforming turkey day dishes into totally new flavors. With recipes this good, youll be twice as full and endlessly more thankful.

programme.title: Meals Under $7
programme.desc: At a loss when your pantry is empty? With these recipes, you can walk into any grocery store with only $7 and walk out with everything you need for an entire meal. Because yes, you can whip up a nutritious meal at an affordable price!

programme.title: Whole Chicken 101
programme.desc: Join Frankie to learn the ins and outs of using every part of a chicken, as he demonstrates how to maximize the value and minimize waste. By cooking smarter, youll have three delectable recipes to last you the whole week.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Too Hot To Cook
programme.desc: When the temps are soaring and turning on your stove or oven is not even an option, Frankies no cook meals will blow you away. Enjoy refreshing, nourishing dishes that will help keep you cool all summer long.

programme.title: Picnic Lunches
programme.desc: Its field trip day, and Frankie shows off his best handheld lunches perfect for leisurely days at the park, the beach or the pool. These sturdy meals are made to travel and only get better with time.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Soak up summer with the ultimate outdoor cookout, featuring smashburgers, pasta salad and scrumptious sweets. These classic dishes can be prepared indoors or out, making them the perfect recipes for backyard dinner parties on warm summer nights.

programme.title: Saved By The Bowl
programme.desc: When youre craving a quick nutritious meal, say no more to throwing cash down the gutter for overpriced takeout bowls! Frankie recreates three restaurant favorites for a fraction of the cost, sparing your bank account without sacrificing flavor.

programme.title: But First, Brunch
programme.desc: Bring your loved ones together over a delicious brunch spread made with love. Whether youre celebrating a major milestone or simply toasting to the weekend, Frankies money-saving menu will have guests buzzing for more.

programme.title: Struggle Splurge
programme.desc: The key to treating yourself on a budget is to keep it simple: these elegant dinners taste like restaurant specials, but they can be prepared in under one hour perfect for easy weeknight meals for a family of any size on a busy schedule.

programme.title: Easy Meals For A Crowd
programme.desc: Finicky family coming to town? Fear not, for Frankies sharing all the struggle tips and tricks to keep the stress levels low and the enjoyment high with simple, delicious meals to please everyone at the table.

programme.title: Holiday Sweet Treats
programme.desc: Tis the jolly season of giving, but this year, there will be no more struggles in making your list and checking it twice. Frankies festive, budget-friendly treats are the sweetest way to tell your friends and family you love them.

programme.title: Homemade For The Holidays
programme.desc: Theres no better way to spread some holiday spirit than at the dinner table with these decadent, festive recipes that can make any long, dark night feel warm and merry. Best of all, they wont freeze your bank account.

programme.title: New Years Party
programme.desc: Wow your party guests this New Years Eve by serving these fancy but frugal dishes to ring in the year right. From appetizers to mocktails, everyone will enjoy your spread!

programme.title: Weeknight Noodles
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten cooks up a collection of easy and satisfying pasta dishes quick enough for weeknights. Dont Panic!

programme.title: Grilling and Smoking
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten grills up a perfect yet simple burger topped with cheddar, lettuce, onion and his special sauce. Dont Panic!

programme.title: Christmas Special
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten celebrates Christmas with his twist on the traditional Feast of the Seven Fishes including ceviche, crudo, oysters and more! Dont Panic!

programme.title: Grandmas Pizza
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten cooks classic Grandma style pizza including homemade dough, sauce and more. Dont Panic!

programme.title: A Journey to Salad Town
programme.desc: Salads can be way more fun! Come to Salad Town, for Mustard-Shallot Vinaigrette; Probiotic Ranch with Cheddar Croutons; a no-measure salad when for when youre in a rush; and the crunchy, crispy, acidic, cheesy, Chopped Salad of your dreams.

programme.title: Rustic Comfort Pastas
programme.desc: Perfect Pantry Puttanesca is packed with more flavor than you could ever hope for; a Rustic Pork Ragu will make you wonder why anyone ever makes Bolognese: and a Vegetarian Mushroom Ragu will make you wonder why anyone ever eats meat.

programme.title: How have you bean?
programme.desc: Beans are one of the best foods in the world. They are sustainable to grow, great for your nutrition, affordable and delicious. So in this episode, were taking a deep dive into beans!

programme.title: The Sandwich Episode
programme.desc: This is.... THE SANDWICH EPISODE, featuring The Bear culinary producer Courtney Storer. Courtney and Noah recreate the iconic steak sandwich from the beloved tv series.

programme.title: The Soup Episode
programme.desc: Its time to get warm and fire up some soup. Pantry Minestrone makes a veggie-loaded comfort soup using almost entirely canned or frozen pantry ingredients. Were also going to show you how to make a beautiful homemade chicken stock.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Special
programme.desc: Noah walks us through making his Smoked Turkey Gravy recipe. Get a jump start on Thanksgiving and make your stock in advance! Saving yourself the headache the day of.

programme.title: Meat Lovers!
programme.desc: On this episode, we serve up our favorite meat-themed recipes! From chicken, to pork and steak, meat lovers everywhere are in for a treat!

programme.title: All About the Bread!
programme.desc: On this episode, we explore some of our favorite bread-themed recipes and learn some fun facts about each dish along the way! From breakfast, to lunch and dinner, your next dish to try at home is just around the corner!

programme.title: Dinner Party!
programme.desc: On this episode, were throwing a Tastemade dinner party, and everyones invited! From appetizers to desserts, we share some of our favorite dinner party recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: Winter Wonderland
programme.desc: When the cold and snowy season descends upon us, its only fitting youll want some delicious, home-cooked food to warm you up. Good thing were taking a trip through our Winter Wonderland today! So toss aside those mittens... its time to cook!

programme.title: Dishes of the World!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip around the world and spotlight some of our favorite recipes from Europe, Asia and Africa. Grab your passport and get ready for a tasty trip!

programme.title: Latin Lovers... Of Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip down to South America as we feature some of our favorite Latin-inspired recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: European Adventure
programme.desc: Today, we embark on a European Adventure! Well be visiting the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Greece to check out their culinary wonders. So what are we waiting for? Lets get to it!

programme.title: Healthy Meals!
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you why eating healthy can still be delicious and enjoyable! Join us for a Tastemade Recipe Rundown of some of our favorite healthy meals!

programme.title: Sweet and Savory!
programme.desc: On this episode, were serving up something for sweet and savory lovers alike. Opposites will attract and stomachs will grumble in this sweet and savory Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Cheat Day!
programme.desc: On this episode, we help you splurge with some of our favorite breakfast, lunch and dinner cheat day recipes! No calorie counting allowed!

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.desc: Its 4th of July and Chef Dale is ready to celebrate by grilling up his takes on summer bbq classics, like his galbi smash double cheeseburger with kimchi special sauce, honey butter steak fries, and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.title: Its Taco Time
programme.desc: Tacos are the way to Chef Dales heart, and to prove it, hes grilling up a sweet and smoky lemongrass and guajillo pork with pineapple, served with coconut and cotija cheese corn and an avocado jicama salad.

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.desc: Grilling isnt only about fast and casual dinners. Chef Dale grills to impress with this elegant, restaurant quality meal of whole roasted fish, coconut milk grits, and snow pea, watermelon and tamarind salad.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, its time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Vegetables, But Delicious
programme.desc: Grilling is the perfect way to imbue your veggies with deliciousness. Chef Dale crafts a family style platter of trumpet mushrooms, eggplant marinated in spicy ssam jang, and charred yellow squash served with a green goddess dressing.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast
programme.desc: The end of summer is near, and Chef Dale goes out in style with a giant seafood feast! Lobster, crab, clams, shrimp, and scallops, all served directly on the table with plenty of buttery garlic bread. Thanks for watching, and until we grill again!

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg And Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, And Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, And Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches youve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, And grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: Summer BBQ
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but theres still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics thatll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: Solo YOLO
programme.desc: Program perjalanan realiti mengenai eksplorasi solo ke beberapa negara, untuk mengalami keunikan pemandangan dan aktiviti tempat di tempat yang dilawati.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan travelog yang akan mengikuti pengembaraan 3 sekawan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik di semenanjung Malaysia demi merealisasikan bucketlist masing-masing.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.
