programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E122
programme.desc: Mientras Victoria le agradece a Sergio por todo su apoyo en esclarecer la muerte de Genara, Sergio lamenta seguir mintiendole a Guanipa sobre el golpe que recibio Nicols en el rescate de su secuestro. Cada la noche, Fernanda quiere asegurarse de que Florencia no la traicione ahora que Moncho declarar a la polica haberla visto en el mismo lugar y el mismo da en que Genara fue asesinada. Al siguiente da, Victoria se presenta en la hacienda Los Samanes para evitar que Florencia huya de la justicia, pues la joven Guanipa est convencida de que Florencia es culpable de la muerte de Genara; Nicols defiende el honor de su esposa al asegurar que Moncho miente en su declaracion.Despues de un da en la jefatura ofreciendo declaraciones, Florencia se comunica con Fernanda para pedirle ayuda, pues necesita revelarle a Nicols que pedio a su hijo sin poner en riesgo su matrimonio. En un nuevo da, Nicols se presenta en la oficina de Sergio para entregarle a Victoria los resultados de los exmenes de ADN donde se demuestra la inocencia de Florencia y Fernanda; una sorprendida Victoria cree que todo es mentira, pero Nicols le aconseja dejar que la justicia se encargue de castigar al verdadero asesino.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E123
programme.desc: Un incredulo Nicols trata de entender como Victoria pudo arremeter violentamente en contra de Florencia a sabiendas de su embarazo, pues ahora Florencia llora la perdida de su hijo. En un nuevo da, Nicols se enfrenta a Victoria, a quien le reprocha haber causado la muerte de su hijo al golpear a Florencia; por ms que Victoria trata de convencerlo de que todo es un invento de su esposa; Nicols est seguro de la culpabilidad de Guanipa. Segura de que todas las pruebas pueden inculpar a Sergio de la muerte de Genara, Fernanda insiste en amenazarlo con acusarlo a la polica si este no la ayuda a arrebatarle la hacienda Cantarrana a la familia Guanipa, as deba traicionar a Victoria; Sergio no tiene otra salida que aceptar el ofrecimiento de Fernanda. Una vez que Florencia se refugia en Fernanda temerosa de que Nicols descubra que ella es quien miente sobre la perdida de su hijo; Eugenia ha escuchado a su madre, a quien le asegura irse junto a su padre apenas este consiga un lugar donde vivir.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E12
programme.desc: amila y Max visitan en la crcel a otra Rosa Blanco. La mujer le confirma que tuvo una hija hembra y casi la convence. Max cree que miente para aprovechar la situacion.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E13
programme.desc: Camila insiste en que la mujer presa es su mam y la Madre Isabel le dice que Rosa Blanco, presa por asesinar a un hombre, no es su madre. El destino entrelaza a las familias en guerra. Buscan identidad de El Doliente

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E31
programme.desc: Ral averigua si Edilio tiene a Cirilo en su casa, pero el joven lo niega; Clara Ines se dispone a llevar a su amado al cuarto donde tienen a su pap.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E32
programme.desc: Ral est dispuesto a poner preso a Fabio si comprueba que quiso violar a Clara Ines.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E31
programme.desc: Ricardo expresses his feelings for Mara Bonita in an attempt to pursue a serious relationship with her. Norma discovers that Gertrudis and Claudio are responsible for Marco Aurelios death. Isabel stands up for Malena. Pedro calls another hitman to eliminate Lorena. Pedro informs Guillermo that his wife is living at the Corona familys house.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E29
programme.desc: Adriana trata de huir de Carlos Ral pero, este la ataja entre sus brazos confesndole que muere por besarla.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E30
programme.desc: Adriana le pregunta a su madre que fue lo que paso con Patricia y justo en el momento que le dice que Patricia es una prostituta, llega Emiliano.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E123
programme.desc: Un incredulo Nicols trata de entender como Victoria pudo arremeter violentamente en contra de Florencia a sabiendas de su embarazo, pues ahora Florencia llora la perdida de su hijo. En un nuevo da, Nicols se enfrenta a Victoria, a quien le reprocha haber causado la muerte de su hijo al golpear a Florencia; por ms que Victoria trata de convencerlo de que todo es un invento de su esposa; Nicols est seguro de la culpabilidad de Guanipa. Segura de que todas las pruebas pueden inculpar a Sergio de la muerte de Genara, Fernanda insiste en amenazarlo con acusarlo a la polica si este no la ayuda a arrebatarle la hacienda Cantarrana a la familia Guanipa, as deba traicionar a Victoria; Sergio no tiene otra salida que aceptar el ofrecimiento de Fernanda. Una vez que Florencia se refugia en Fernanda temerosa de que Nicols descubra que ella es quien miente sobre la perdida de su hijo; Eugenia ha escuchado a su madre, a quien le asegura irse junto a su padre apenas este consiga un lugar donde vivir.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E124
programme.desc: Dispuesto a esclarecer el misterio sobre la muerte de Genara, Federico le ofrece ayuda a Sergio para castigar al verdadero culpable del asesinato as este sea su propia madre (Fernanda). Cada la noche, Florencia semidesnuda- se acuesta al lado de un embriagado Nicols para hacerle creer que han dormido juntos, pues la joven Zapata solo necesita un hijo para recuperar el amor de Nicols. Al siguiente da, Nicols lamenta haber usado a Florencia; el hombre no puede ofrecerle amor, por lo que sera un error concebir otro hijo; a pesar de que el dolor de perder a su primer hijo los une, Nicols decide separarse de ella. A solas, Florencia se comunica con Hilario para citarlo en las tierras de Cantarrana; Florencia tiene la intencion de embarazarse para as retener a su esposo a su lado.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E13
programme.desc: Camila insiste en que la mujer presa es su mam y la Madre Isabel le dice que Rosa Blanco, presa por asesinar a un hombre, no es su madre. El destino entrelaza a las familias en guerra. Buscan identidad de El Doliente

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E14
programme.desc: Ezequiel propone reunirse en una cena con Camila para decirle que va a sacar de la carcel a

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E32
programme.desc: Ral est dispuesto a poner preso a Fabio si comprueba que quiso violar a Clara Ines.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E33
programme.desc: Ral le asegura a Clara Ines que cuenta con todo el tiempo del mundo, para ella para perdonarlo y el para amarla; la pareja se besa enamorada.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E32
programme.desc: Isabel and Malena seal their pact of unconditional friendship. Alberto obtains a copy of the file of the drug trafficker accused of Marco Aurelios death. Magda tells Lorena what happened and suggests opening an e-mail account, where the video with her confession will be kept. Alberto raises the possibility that his uncle Claudio is involved in his fathers death.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E33
programme.desc: Malena knows she must return home to avoid losing her son. Pedro instructs Cheo to liquidate Lorena; without hurting Alberto. Ricardo is still not sure which of the Marias is the swindler. Lorena kisses Alberto goodbye and Cheo is close by, waiting for the right moment to dissipate.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E29
programme.desc: Adriana trata de huir de Carlos Ral pero, este la ataja entre sus brazos confesndole que muere por besarla.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E30
programme.desc: Adriana le pregunta a su madre que fue lo que paso con Patricia y justo en el momento que le dice que Patricia es una prostituta, llega Emiliano.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E123
programme.desc: Un incredulo Nicols trata de entender como Victoria pudo arremeter violentamente en contra de Florencia a sabiendas de su embarazo, pues ahora Florencia llora la perdida de su hijo. En un nuevo da, Nicols se enfrenta a Victoria, a quien le reprocha haber causado la muerte de su hijo al golpear a Florencia; por ms que Victoria trata de convencerlo de que todo es un invento de su esposa; Nicols est seguro de la culpabilidad de Guanipa. Segura de que todas las pruebas pueden inculpar a Sergio de la muerte de Genara, Fernanda insiste en amenazarlo con acusarlo a la polica si este no la ayuda a arrebatarle la hacienda Cantarrana a la familia Guanipa, as deba traicionar a Victoria; Sergio no tiene otra salida que aceptar el ofrecimiento de Fernanda. Una vez que Florencia se refugia en Fernanda temerosa de que Nicols descubra que ella es quien miente sobre la perdida de su hijo; Eugenia ha escuchado a su madre, a quien le asegura irse junto a su padre apenas este consiga un lugar donde vivir.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E124

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E31
programme.desc: Ninoska contina tratando de hablar mal de los Palacios,diciendo que una de las Palacios es la oveja negra de la familia. Carlos Ral estalla ante este comentario.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E124
programme.desc: Dispuesto a esclarecer el misterio sobre la muerte de Genara, Federico le ofrece ayuda a Sergio para castigar al verdadero culpable del asesinato as este sea su propia madre (Fernanda). programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E125 - Episodio 125
programme.desc: Tras descubrir a Florencia en compaa de Hilario, Nicols acusa a Guanipa de estar manipulando a la mujer para que esta le de informacion sobre la investigacion que realiza Nicols sobre la muerte de su padre. Mientras Hilario admite ante su hija Victoria ser el culpable del incendio que azota las tierras de Cantarrana por su afn de vengarse de Nicols; un peon le notifica a Nicols que un feroz incendio arrasa con los maizales de Los Samanes. Sergio acepta la propuesta de matrimonio de Victoria y espera que algn da lo ame tanto como el.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E14
programme.desc: Ezequiel propone reunirse en una cena con Camila para decirle que va a sacar de la carcel a

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E15
programme.desc: Camila est feliz pues su madre, al fin, est libre, pero Max sigue dudando. Reunidas, quiere saber porque la abandono la mujer finge no recordar esos momentos dolorosos. La abandona por segunda vez. Es un golpe muy fuerte.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E34
programme.desc: Guillermo catches up with Cheo and kills him; he is now pointing at Alberto and Lorena Gunshots are heard in the house. programme.title: Dropped - S03:E08 - Log Jammed
programme.desc: While the brothers get closer to a part of the river packed with moose, they face a bunch of problems. They have to find a way around and carry their stuff over a huge pile of logs that could mess up their hunt, possibly pushing them into a part of the river they werent ready for.

programme.title: Dropped - S03:E09 - Bull In The Bush
programme.desc: After more than three weeks trekking through moose country, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer finally set up camp in a new spot and almost immediately come face-to-face with a massive bull.

programme.title: Dropped - S03:E10 - End Of The Line
programme.desc: With the odds piling against them, the 80-mile river adventure is almost over, and brothers Chris and Casey Keefer have one final opportunity to find an Alaskan moose just a few miles from where theyll be picked up at the river junction.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E06 - On the Move
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E07 - Permanent Residence
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven find a long term camping spot out fo the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E08 - Focused on Food
programme.desc: Laramy locates some whitetail deer and focuses his efforts on hunting them.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E09 - Thriving
programme.desc: Stocked up on food, Laramy and Seven thrive in their new location. Laramy focuses on building some amenities to make life easier on The Trail.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E10 - Return Home
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven say goodbye to their final camp and head back home.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E02 - Nightmare Canyon Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2: Justin and Jeremy Harriss climbing weekend has resulted in serious jeopardy for the brothers. With Justin totally incapacitated when he breaks his leg it is up to Jeremy to go it alone and try and raise help. As night falls and temperatures drop to freezing time is critical if the brothers are to survive.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E03 - Under the Desert Sun
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E12 - The New Royals
programme.desc: Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie have gone through a lot of media attention and tough situations in their lives. From their parents very public split to being targeted by the press, theyve been through quite a bit. Despite all this, they remain dedicated to supporting the monarchy with their charity work. Through serving the Commonwealth, both sisters continue to make a positive impact.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E07 - Operation Spotted Dog
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E08 - Operation Boat Float
programme.desc: In the shade of the wild mountains, the Yellowstone River transforms into a colorful spectacle during the yearly boat float weekend. Armed with jet boats, the Wardens gear up for a wild time, looking out for the river and helping out the wacky rafters.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E10 - Return Home
programme.desc: Caseys bull disappeared downstream quickly, heading into uncharted waters the brothers hadnt explored yet. Theyre eager to see what happens next.

programme.title: The New Frontier - S03:E05 - Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter. and The New Horizons speeds on it its next encounter at the edge of the solar system.

programme.title: The New Frontier - S03:E06 - Sling Shot
programme.desc: Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination, we checkout the latest probes about to slingshot about the solar system.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E09 - Private Military Contractors
programme.desc: The practice of hiring private armies goes back to ancient times, and the mystique associated with the mercenary warrior has been the subject of many historical studies and fictional characterizations. This episode of CQB takes a more contemporary look at a day in the life of a group of civilian contractors, and how their role has evolved on the modern battlefield. Using its sub-second analysis techniques and intimate first-person footage, CQB reveals the backgrounds, training and equipment of todays soldiers for hire and how private armies are re-shaping the way conflicts are conducted around the world.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E10 - Close Protection
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conflict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traffic, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E04 - The Bears that Couldnt Be
programme.desc: Temperate Rain Forest. Jim and Corey search for an epic hunting spot deep in the coastal rain forest of Vancouver Island that Jim last explored 20 years ago.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E13 - William And Kate One Year On
programme.desc: William and Catherine got married in a fairytale ceremony on April 29, 2011, with more than two billion people tuning in and celebrations happening all around the world.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E12 - The New Royals
programme.desc: Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie have gone through a lot of media attention and tough situations in their lives. From their parents very public split to being targeted by the press, theyve been through quite a bit. Despite all this, they remain dedicated to supporting the monarchy with their charity work. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traffic, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E04 - The Bears that Couldnt Be
programme.desc: Temperate Rain Forest. Jim and Corey search for an epic hunting spot deep in the coastal rain forest of Vancouver Island that Jim last explored 20 years ago.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E13 - William And Kate One Year On
programme.desc: William and Catherine got married in a fairytale ceremony on April 29, 2011, with more than two billion people tuning in and celebrations happening all around the world.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E12 - The New Royals
programme.desc: Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie have gone through a lot of media attention and tough situations in their lives. From their parents very public split to being targeted by the press, theyve been through quite a bit. Despite all this, they remain dedicated to supporting the monarchy with their charity work. Through serving the Commonwealth, both sisters continue to make a positive impact.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E07 - Operation Spotted Dog
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E08 - Operation Boat Float
programme.desc: In the shade of the wild mountains, the Yellowstone River transforms into a colorful spectacle during the yearly boat float weekend. Armed with jet boats, the Wardens gear up for a wild time, looking out for the river and helping out the wacky rafters.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E10 - Return Home
programme.desc: Caseys bull disappeared downstream quickly, heading into uncharted waters the brothers hadnt explored yet. Theyre eager to see what happens next.

programme.title: The New Frontier - S03:E05 - Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter. and The New Horizons speeds on it its next encounter at the edge of the solar system.

programme.title: The New Frontier - S03:E06 - Sling Shot
programme.desc: Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination, we checkout the latest probes about to slingshot about the solar system.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E09 - Private Military Contractors
programme.desc: The practice of hiring private armies goes back to ancient times, and the mystique associated with the mercenary warrior has been the subject of many historical studies and fictional characterizations. This episode of CQB takes a more contemporary look at a day in the life of a group of civilian contractors, and how their role has evolved on the modern battlefield. Using its sub-second analysis techniques and intimate first-person footage, CQB reveals the backgrounds, training and equipment of todays soldiers for hire and how private armies are re-shaping the way conflicts are conducted around the world.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E13 - William And Kate One Year On
programme.desc: William and Catherine got married in a fairytale ceremony on April 29, 2011, with more than two billion people tuning in and celebrations happening all around the world.

programme.title: Harry And Meghan: A Very Modern Romance
programme.desc: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry share similar interests and seem like a perfect match. Both have faced tough times growing up but have come out on top. Now theyre winning together. This hour-long special, featuring a chat with author Andrew Morton, explores the social backdrop that makes their bold marriage fit right in with todays British Royal Family.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E09 - Operation Mac Pass
programme.desc: In this episode, the Wardens get a Tip-Mont call about some elk that were taken illegally and go after the suspects.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E10 - Operation Paddlefish
programme.desc: This week, our Wardens are out in Montana keeping an eye on the rivers as folks go paddlefishing, and were also trying to get rid of a troublesome bear from someones property.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E01 - Hell Has A Name
programme.desc: At the start of Season Two of Dropped, we get a closer look at the adventures on the way to Base Camp and sheep camp.

programme.title: The New Frontier - S03:E07 - Living Planet
programme.desc: With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: The New Frontier - S03:E08 - Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: Cosmic and x rays, these mysterious and highly powerful particles from deep space are being investigated to finally discover where they come from.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E11 - Counter Terrorism
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counter terrorism forces were effectively given a blank cheque when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an indepth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an officer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E12 - French Foreign Legion
programme.desc: No country other than France operates an elite military force that invites foreign nationals to serve in its ranks. With a reputation for being a safe haven for individuals with questionable pasts, the French Foreign Legion is a true mercenary army that has garnered significant respect within the global special operations community. This episode of CQB examines a raid by the Foreign Legion on a small airport in Iraq during the 1990 Gulf War, exploring the nature of the Legion, how it differs from other special forces, and how it prepares for a wide variety of close quarter battle scenarios in conflict situations around the world.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E05 - Life and Death
programme.desc: Temperate Rain Forest Pt2. Jim comes face to face with a monster black bear in the coastal rain forest of the Pacific Northwest.

programme.desc: Remembering Diana, Princess of Wales includes scenes from her state funeral and heartfelt words from her closest friends. Its a warm and reflective look at Diana both as a person and a public figure: the queen that never was and the princess wholl always be remembered.

programme.title: Danger Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Nicolette, a high school senior has bounced around from foster home to home. She started feeling hopeless when found herself pregnant by the school quarterback.

programme.title: Stolen in her Sleep
programme.desc: New mom Hallie Reynolds is devoted to baby AVA, who had a heart transplant when she was born; but motherhood is exhausting and her mother-in-law is overbearing, so Hallie is thrilled when she makes a new friend in Megan Banks. Hallies life takes a sinister turn as danger seems to follow her every move, and she starts to question whether someone is out to kill her and take her child or if its just her mind playing tricks.

programme.title: A Match for the Prince
programme.desc: A medieval romance novelist is hired to be a matchmaker for a real-life prince in a desperate attempt to find true love before the fixed royal wedding date.

programme.title: The Story of Love
programme.desc: Ruby, an aspiring romance novelist, joins a writers retreat in Tahoe hosted by her literary hero and hottest writer around, Marcus Harlow, in order to win a lucrative book deal. But when Woody, the outdoorsy hotel owner, shows her the beauty of nature, Ruby wonders if shes been writing the wrong kinds of stories to impress people like Marcus.

programme.title: Pocket Dial Murder
programme.desc: Follows Stacey as she receives a pocket dial from her husband. She hears the death of a woman on the other end, and when her husband comes home, he says he has lost his phone.

programme.title: Killer Queen Bee
programme.desc: Dylan is transferred to a new school after her mom is put in a rehabilitation center for pain pill abuse. After a run in with high school mean girl Tiffany, soon Tiffany is plotting to make Dylans life a living hell.

programme.title: A Deadly Mistake
programme.desc: After graphics designer April gets into a car accident that leaves her boyfriend Patrick in a coma, she is subject to panic attacks. But does her new male friend have a hidden agenda?

programme.title: Love Afloat
programme.desc: When Lorelei inherits a shabby sailboat from a distant relative, she hires Rob to help clean, fix and sail it from its present location at a Caribbean island to Miami. The two will have to work together as romantic sparks start to fly.

programme.title: Love in Translation
programme.desc: Linguistics Ph.D. student Julie, can speak almost every language you can imagine. Things turn upside down for Julie when handsome Dan, contacts her to get some French classes. Sparks soon fly - could this be their perfect match?

programme.title: Modeled with Love
programme.desc: When model-maker Olivias dad is set to retire from their firm, she believes shes the obvious pick to take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend Olivias comfortable bubble along with her role as successor.

programme.title: Love on the Reef
programme.desc: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before its too late.

Determined to find out the real reasons behind the marriage, Jessica gets pulled into a whirlwind of events, putting her own life at risk. Is Carlos in trouble? Or is Grace a victim?
